Interviewed on midlife/ menopause for Women’s Health Magazine, March 2025

Quoted in: ‘Whatever happened to middle age? The mysterious case of the disappearing life stage.’ The Guardian, February 2023

‘Menopause is a moment for women to welcome, not dread.’ The i, September 2022

‘Roman remains: a walk through history in Snowdonia’. The Guardian, December 2019

‘The power of fairy tales in women’s lives’. The Scotsman, October 2019

‘How Irish myth and folklore can inspire women to fight for ecological change’. Irish Times, October 2019

‘Love Letter to a Bog’. Caught by the River, 2016.
